Failed to move file or directory: {0}: Ne udalos' peremestit' fayl ili katalog: {0}
Enter a file or folder to remove. You mu: Vvedite fayl ili papku dlya udaleniya. U vas dolzhny byt' prava administratora dlya vashey uchetnoy zapisi, chtoby imet' vozmozhnost' udalit'.
Ne udalos' udalit' vsyu pochtu, otpravlennuyu {0}.
Moves file or directory to another file: Peremeshchayet fayl ili katalog v drugoy fayl ili katalog. Vy takzhe mozhete ispol'zovat' eto dlya pereimenovaniya faylov.
Enter a source path and a destination pa: Vvedite iskhodnyy put' i put' naznacheniya.
Copies file or directory to another file: Kopiruyet fayl ili katalog v drugoy fayl ili katalog.
Ne udalos' peremestit' vsyu pochtu, otpravlennuyu {0}.
Message {0} from {1} moved from {2}. {3}: Soobshcheniye {0} ot {1} peremeshcheno iz {2}. Ostalos' proanalizirovat' {3} soobshcheniy.
Shows weather info for specified city. U: Pokazyvayet informatsiyu o pogode dlya ukazannogo goroda. Ispol'zuyet OpenWeatherMap.
You can get your own API key at https://: Vy mozhete poluchit' svoy sobstvennyy klyuch API na https://home.openweathermap.org/api_keys.
You can always consult http://bulk.openw: Vy vsegda mozhete obratit'sya k http://bulk.openweathermap.org/sample/city.list.json.gz dlya polucheniya spiska gorodov s ikh identifikatorami.
Sets up the kernel so it prompts you for: Ustanavlivayet yadro ​​tak, chtoby ono zaprashivalo argument pri zagruzke.
Triggers maintenance mode. This disables: Zapuskayet rezhim obsluzhivaniya. Eto otklyuchayet neskol'ko uchetnykh zapisey.
Pri kazhdom zapuske on budet proveryat' nalichiye obnovleniy.
When switching languages, change the mon: Pri pereklyuchenii yazykov izmenite nazvaniya mesyatsev, kalendar' i t. D.
If the kernel is started, it will set ro: Yesli yadro ​​zapushcheno, ono ustanovit parol' root.
Ne soobshchayte soobshcheniyam o proverke oborudovaniya.
Show Message of the Day before displayin: Pokazat' soobshcheniye dnya pered otobrazheniyem ekrana vkhoda v sistemu.
Clear screen before displaying login scr: Ochistite ekran pered otobrazheniyem ekrana vkhoda v sistemu.
Pokazyvayet dostupnykh pol'zovateley, yesli on vklyuchen.
Simplified help command for all the shel: Uproshchennaya komanda spravki dlya vsekh obolochek
Nuzhno li registrirovat' imya pol'zovatelya FTP.
Pick the first profile only when connect: Vybirat' pervyy profil' tol'ko pri podklyuchenii.
The time and date will be shown in the u: Vremya i data budut otobrazhat'sya v pravom verkhnem uglu ekrana.
If enabled, the kernel will parse the wh: Yesli etot parametr vklyuchen, yadro ​​proanaliziruyet vsyu papku na predmet yeye obshchego razmera. V protivnom sluchaye budet analizirovat'sya tol'ko poverkhnost'.
The time and date will be longer, showin: Vremya i data budut dlinneye, budut otobrazhat'sya polnyye nazvaniya mesyatsev i t. D.
Select your preferred unit for temperatu: Vyberite predpochitayemuyu yedinitsu izmereniya temperatury (eto otnositsya tol'ko k komande «pogoda»).
Mod {0} does not have the part name. Mod: U moda {0} net nazvaniya detali. Ne udalos' proanalizirovat' mod. Prosmotrite iskhodnyy kod.
Mod {0} does not have the command. Mod p: U moda {0} net komandy. Ne udalos' proanalizirovat' mod. Prosmotrite iskhodnyy kod.
You must turn on debug mode before you c: Pered ochistkoy zhurnala otladki neobkhodimo vklyuchit' rezhim otladki.
Can't remove {0} because it doesn't exis: Nevozmozhno udalit' {0}, potomu chto on ne sushchestvuyet.
Can't get information about nonexistent: Ne mogu poluchit' informatsiyu o nesushchestvuyushchem kataloge.
Ne mogu poluchit' informatsiyu o nesushchestvuyushchem fayle.
The file is an archive. Used for backups: Fayl predstavlyayet soboy arkhiv. Ispol'zuyetsya dlya rezervnogo kopirovaniya.
Replaces a word or phrase with another o: Zamenyayet slovo ili frazu drugim v stroke
Prevyshen uroven' krasnogo tsveta. Eto bylo {0}.
Prevyshen uroven' zelenogo tsveta. Eto bylo {0}.
Prevyshen uroven' sinego tsveta. Eto bylo {0}.
Activates true color support for ColorMi: Aktiviruyet podderzhku istinnogo tsveta dlya ColorMix.
Aktiviruyet podderzhku istinnogo tsveta dlya Disco.
Activates true color support for Glitter: Aktiviruyet podderzhku istinnogo tsveta dlya GlitterColor.
Aktiviruyet podderzhku istinnogo tsveta dlya liniy.
{0} seychas ne mozhet prisoyedinit'sya k udalennoy otladke.
Disco will cycle colors when enabled. Ot: Pri vklyuchenii Disco budet cheredovat' tsveta. V protivnom sluchaye vyberite sluchaynyye tsveta.
Enter file paths to attachments. Press E: Vvedite puti k faylam dlya vlozheniy. Nazhmite ENTER na pustom puti dlya podtverzhdeniya.
Asks you to fill the required fields to: Prosit vas zapolnit' obyazatel'nyye polya dlya otpravki zashifrovannogo soobshcheniya na adres
Show progress bar while downloading or u: Pokazyvat' indikator vypolneniya pri zagruzke ili vygruzke s pomoshch'yu komandy "get" ili "put"
If true, it makes \"get\" or \"put\" sho: Yesli eto pravda, eto zastavlyayet "poluchit'" ili "polozhit'" pokazyvat' indikator vypolneniya pri zagruzke ili zagruzke.
Please use \"ftp\" if you are going to u: Pozhaluysta, ispol'zuyte "ftp", yesli vy sobirayetes' zagruzhat' fayly na FTP-server.
Write how many times the \"put\" command: Napishite, skol'ko raz komanda «polozhit'» dolzhna povtoryat' neudachnyye zagruzki. On dolzhen byt' chislovym.
The specified line number may not be lar: Ukazannyy nomer stroki ne mozhet byt' bol'she, chem nomer stroki poslednego fayla.
Activates true color support for Dissolv: Aktiviruyet podderzhku istinnogo tsveta dlya Dissolve.
Makes a directory in the current working: Sozdayet katalog v tekushchem rabochem kataloge
Removes a directory from the current wor: Udalyayet katalog iz tekushchego rabochego kataloga
This section lists all general kernel se: V etom razdele perechisleny vse obshchiye nastroyki yadra, v osnovnom dlya podderzhki yadra.
This section changes hardware probe beha: Etot razdel izmenyayet povedeniye apparatnogo datchika.
This section represents the login settin: V etom razdele predstavleny nastroyki vkhoda v sistemu. Vyydite iz svoyey uchetnoy zapisi, chtoby izmeneniya vstupili v silu.
V etom razdele perechisleny nastroyki obolochki.
This section lists the network settings,: V etom razdele perechisleny parametry seti, takiye kak obolochka FTP, parametry setevykh komand i parametry udalennoy otladki.
This section lists all the screensavers: V etom razdele perechisleny vse zastavki i ikh dostupnyye nastroyki.
Settings that don't fit in their appropr: Zdes' poyavlyayutsya nastroyki, kotoryye ne pomeshchayutsya v sootvetstvuyushchiye razdely.
* Press any key to start the kernel or E: * Nazhmite lyubuyu klavishu dlya zapuska yadra ili ESC dlya vykhoda.
When listing mail messages, show body pr: Pri perechislenii pochtovykh soobshcheniy pokazyvat' predvaritel'nyy prosmotr tela.
Activates true color support for Bouncin: Aktiviruyet podderzhku istinnogo tsveta dlya BouncingBlock.
Popytka poluchit' dostup k nevernomu puti.
Queries a character in a specified line: Zaprashivayet simvol v ukazannoy stroke ili vo vsekh strokakh
Checking for updates is disabled because: Proverka obnovleniy otklyuchena, potomu chto vy ispol'zuyete versiyu dlya razrabotki.
Turns on or off the text editor autosave: Vklyuchayet ili vyklyuchayet funktsiyu avtosokhraneniya tekstovogo redaktora.
If autosave is enabled, the text file wi: Yesli avtosokhraneniye vklyucheno, tekstovyy fayl budet sokhranyat'sya kazhdyye «n» sekund.
Zapisyvayet udalennyy chat otladki v zhurnal otladki.
How many milliseconds to wait before mak: Skol'ko millisekund zhdat' pered sleduyushchey zapis'yu?
Nedopustimaya posledovatel'nost' VT dlya tsveta RGB.
Activates true color support for Progres: Aktiviruyet podderzhku istinnogo tsveta dlya ProgressClock.
The color of seconds progress bar. It ca: Tsvet indikatora vypolneniya v sekundakh. Eto mozhet byt' 1-16, 1-255 ili «1-255;1-255;1-255».
The color of minutes progress bar. It ca: Tsvet indikatora vypolneniya minut. Eto mozhet byt' 1-16, 1-255 ili «1-255;1-255;1-255».
The color of hours progress bar. It can: Tsvet indikatora vypolneniya chasov. Eto mozhet byt' 1-16, 1-255 ili «1-255;1-255;1-255».
The color of date information. It can be: Tsvet informatsii o date. Eto mozhet byt' 1-16, 1-255 ili «1-255;1-255;1-255».
If color cycling is enabled, how many ti: Yesli cheredovaniye tsvetov vklyucheno, skol'ko tikov pered izmeneniyem tsveta v ProgressClock? 1 tik = 0,5 sekundy
ProgressClock will select random colors: ProgressClock vyberet sluchaynyye tsveta, yesli on vklyuchen. V protivnom sluchaye ispol'zuyte tsveta iz config.
Select color using \"<-\" and \"->\" key: Vyberite tsvet s pomoshch'yu klavish «<-» i «->». Dlya vykhoda nazhmite ENTER. Nazhmite «i», chtoby vvesti nomer tsveta vruchnuyu.
Vyberite tsvet s pomoshch'yu klavish «<-» i «->». Ispol'zuyte strelki vverkh i vniz dlya vybora tsvetovykh diapazonov. Dlya vykhoda nazhmite ENTER. Nazhmite «i», chtoby vvesti nomer tsveta vruchnuyu.
Use \"hwinfo\" for extended information: Ispol'zuyte "hwinfo" dlya polucheniya rasshirennoy informatsii ob oborudovanii.
GPU: One or more of the graphics cards f: Graficheskiy protsessor: ne udalos' proverit' odnu ili neskol'ko videokart. Vse ravno otobrazhayetsya informatsiya ...
>> Welcome! This is your first time ente: >> Dobro pozhalovat'! Eto vash pervyy vkhod v udalennuyu otladku i chat. Ispol'zuyte "/ register <name>" dlya registratsii.
The command is not wrappable. These comm: Komanda ne oborachivayetsya. Eti komandy mozhno obernut':
There is an error while downloading debu: Oshibka pri zagruzke dannykh otladki. Prover'te vashe internet-soyedineniye.

Wraps the list outputs if it seems too l: Zavershayet vyvod spiska, yesli on kazhetsya slishkom dlinnym dlya tekushchey geometrii konsoli.

Sokhranit' temu v drugoy katalog kak ...

The specified ZIP shell command is not f: Ukazannaya komanda obolochki ZIP ne naydena.
Activates true color support for Lighter: Aktiviruyet podderzhku istinnogo tsveta dlya svetleye.

Invalid color specifier. Ensure that it': Nedopustimyy spetsifikator tsveta. Ubedites', chto eto pravil'nyy format, chto oznachayet chislo ot 0 do 255 pri ispol'zovanii 255 tsvetov ili posledovatel'nost' VT pri ispol'zovanii istinnogo tsveta sleduyushchim obrazom:
Thank you for raising a ticket to us! Se: Spasibo, chto podnyali nam bilet! Vyberite, kakoy u vas zapros.
Ask a question, jot your idea, or report: Zadayte vopros, zapishite svoyu ideyu ili soobshchite o probleme.
Enter the location of the private key fo: Vvedite raspolozheniye zakrytogo klyucha dlya {0}. Napishite «q», chtoby zavershit' dobavleniye klyuchey:
Error trying to add private key:: Oshibka pri popytke dobavit' zakrytyy klyuch:
Nazhmite «t», chtoby pereklyuchit'sya v rezhim 255 tsvetov.
Press \"t\" to switch to true color mode: Nazhmite «t», chtoby pereklyuchit'sya v rezhim istinnogo tsveta.
This section lets you choose what type o: V etom razdele vy mozhete vybrat', kakoy tsvet vy khotite izmenit'.
It looks like you've got no user except: Pokhozhe, u vas net pol'zovatelya krome root. Eto plokho. My rasskazhem, kak yego sozdat'.
Vy dolzhny napisat' svoye imya pol'zovatelya.
Administrator: This account type has the: Administrator: etot tip uchetnoy zapisi imeyet naibol'shuyu moshchnost' v yadre, pozvolyaya vam ispol'zovat' programmy upravleniya sistemoy.
Normal User: This account type is slight: Obychnyy pol'zovatel': etot tip uchetnoy zapisi nemnogo boleye ogranichen, chem administratory.
Congratulations! You've made a new accou: Pozdravlyayu! Vy sozdali novuyu uchetnuyu zapis'! Chtoby zakonchit' eto, voydite v svoyu novuyu uchetnuyu zapis'.
Consult the screensaver manual or source: Dlya polucheniya informatsii obratites' k rukovodstvu po khraneniyu ekrana ili k iskhodnomu kodu.
Group of paths separated by the colon. I: Gruppa putey, razdelennykh dvoyetochiyem. On rabotayet tak zhe, kak PATH. Napishite polnyy put' k papke ili imya papki. Kogda vy zakonchite, napishite «q». Napishite znak minus ryadom s putem, chtoby udalit' sushchestvuyushchiy katalog.
Queries a word in a specified line or al: Zaprashivayet slovo v ukazannoy stroke ili vo vsekh strokakh
Prints a string to console using color t: Vyvodit stroku na konsol', ispol'zuya tsvetovoy tip i strochnuyu pechat'
Vyvodit stroku na konsol', ispol'zuya tsvetovoy tip i strochnuyu pechat' s podderzhkoy formata
Prints a string to debugger with format: Pechatayet stroku v otladchik s podderzhkoy formata
Tests the kernel error facility with for: Testiruyet sredstvo oshibok yadra s podderzhkoy formata
Tests translating a string that exists i: Testy, perevodyashchiye stroku, kotoraya sushchestvuyet v resursakh, na opredelennyy yazyk
Prints a string to console and parses th: Vyvodit stroku na konsol' i analiziruyet naydennyye zapolniteli
Tests the VT sequence for true color: Proveryayet posledovatel'nost' ZHT na istinnyy tsvet
Tests printing date using different cale: Testy pechati daty s ispol'zovaniyem raznykh kalendarey
What compiler variables are enabled in t: Kakiye peremennyye kompilyatora vklyucheny v prilozhenii?
Exits the test shell and starts the kern: Vykhodit iz testovoy obolochki i zapuskayet yadro
Exits the test shell and shuts down the: Vykhodit iz testovoy obolochki i vyklyuchayet yadro
Saves the current directory to kernel co: Sokhranyayet tekushchiy katalog v fayl konfiguratsii yadra
Tests the list writer with the string an: Proveryayet sredstvo zapisi spiska so strokoy i massivom strok
Tests the list writer with the integer a: Proveryayet sredstvo zapisi spiska s tselochislennym i tselochislennym massivami
Tests the list writer with the char and: Proveryayet sredstvo zapisi spiska s pomoshch'yu massiva char i char
Write an RPC port. It must be numeric, a: Napishite port RPC. On dolzhen byt' chislovym, i yego nel'zya uzhe ispol'zovat'. V protivnom sluchaye RPC ne smozhet otkryt' port.
RPC ne zapuskayetsya, potomu chto on otklyuchen.
Searches for specified string in the pro: Ishchet ukazannuyu stroku v predostavlennom fayle s pomoshch'yu regulyarnykh vyrazheniy
See if you can press a key on time: Posmotrite, smozhete li vy vovremya nazhat' klavishu
User didn't provide any input in a timel: Pol'zovatel' ne predostavil nikakikh dannykh svoyevremenno.
Gets the date and time information: Poluchayet informatsiyu o date i vremeni
Failed to parse date information for: Ne udalos' proanalizirovat' informatsiyu o date dlya
Sets file permissions. This is supported: Ustanavlivayet prava dostupa k faylam. Eto podderzhivayetsya tol'ko na FTP-serverakh pod upravleniyem Unix.
You must connect to server before perfor: Vy dolzhny podklyuchit'sya k serveru pered vypolneniyem operatsiy s faylovoy sistemoy.
Ne udalos' ustanovit' razresheniya s {0} na {1}.
Beware that most files won't download or: Pomnite, chto bol'shinstvo faylov ne budut zagruzhat'sya ili vygruzhat'sya dolzhnym obrazom v etom rezhime, poetomu my nastoyatel'no rekomenduyem ispol'zovat' dvoichnyy rezhim v bol'shinstve situatsiy.
Trying to send an RPC command while RPC: Popytka otpravit' komandu RPC, kogda RPC ne zapuskayetsya.
How many milliseconds to wait before fad: Skol'ko millisekund zhdat', prezhde chem tekst ischeznet?
If true, probes all the hardware; else,: Yesli true, proveryayet vse oborudovaniye; v protivnom sluchaye budet proveryat'sya tol'ko neobkhodimoye oborudovaniye.
Failed to remove screensaver {0} from co: Ne udalos' udalit' zastavku {0} iz konfiguratsii.
Failed to set a setting for screensaver: Ne udalos' ustanovit' nastroyki dlya zastavki.
This section lets you manage root passwo: Etot razdel pozvolyayet vam upravlyat' sozdaniyem parolya root.
Opens an RSS shell to read the feeds: Otkryvayet obolochku RSS dlya chteniya lent
Exits RSS shell and returns to kernel: Vykhodit iz obolochki RSS i vozvrashchayetsya v yadro
The specified RSS shell command is not f: Ukazannaya komanda obolochki RSS ne naydena.
Article number couldn't be bigger than t: Nomer artikula ne mozhet byt' bol'she imeyushchikhsya artikulov.
Failed to make a list of filesystem entr: Ne udalos' sozdat' spisok zapisey faylovoy sistemy dlya kataloga
Controls the direction of filesystem sor: Upravlyayet napravleniyem sortirovki faylovoy sistemy po vozrastaniyu ili ubyvaniyu.
How many milliseconds to wait before wri: Skol'ko millisekund zhdat', prezhde chem snova pisat' tekst?
Write any text you want shown. Longer is: Napishite lyuboy tekst, kotoryy khotite pokazat'. Chem dol'she, tem luchshe.
Maximum writing speed in WPM: Maksimal'naya skorost' zapisi v slovakh v minutu
Aktiviruyet podderzhku istinnogo tsveta dlya Wipe.
How many wipes to do before changing dir: Skol'ko vaypov nuzhno sdelat' pered sluchaynym izmeneniyem napravleniya?
Referenced file {0} not found. This mod: Ssylochnyy fayl {0} ne nayden. Bez etogo fayla etot mod mozhet rabotat' nekorrektno.
Which variant of {0} is being used to ch: Kakoy variant {0} ispol'zuyetsya dlya izmeneniya nazvaniya mesyatsa, kalendarya i t. D.?

One or both of the numbers are not numer: Odno ili oba chisla ne yavlyayutsya chislovymi.

Activates true color support for Bouncin: Aktiviruyet podderzhku istinnogo tsveta dlya BouncingText.

Shows what file is being processed durin: Pokazyvayet, kakoy fayl obrabatyvayetsya vo vremya operatsiy faylovoy sistemy
Either the hardware type {0} is not prob: Libo tip oborudovaniya {0} ne proveryayetsya, libo nedeystvitelen.
Tip oborudovaniya {0} yeshche ne issledovan. Yesli vy uvereny, chto eto provereno, perezapustite yadro ​​s vklyuchennoy otladkoy.
If enabled, green console will be enable: Yesli vklyucheno, zelenaya konsol' budet vklyuchena.
Prints a separator with color and format: Pechatayet razdelitel' s podderzhkoy tsveta i formata
Activates true color support for Marquee: Aktiviruyet podderzhku istinnogo tsveta dlya Marquee.
Napishite lyuboy tekst, kotoryy khotite pokazat'.
Whether the text shown on the marquee is: Vsegda li tekst, otobrazhayemyy v ramke, nakhoditsya po tsentru.
Screensaver experienced an error while d: V zastavke voznikla oshibka pri otobrazhenii: {0}. Nazhmite lyubuyu klavishu dlya vykhoda.
Here's how your theme will look like:: Vot kak budet vyglyadet' vasha tema:
Mod {0} has invalid command. Mod parsing: U moda {0} nedopustimaya komanda. Ne udalos' proanalizirovat' mod. Prosmotrite iskhodnyy kod.
Whether to use the Console API to clear: Sleduyet li ispol'zovat' konsol'nyy API dlya ochistki teksta ili ispol'zovat' boleye bystruyu posledovatel'nost' VT dlya ochistki stroki. Yesli False, Marquee budet ispol'zovat' sootvetstvuyushchuyu posledovatel'nost' VT. V protivnom sluchaye on budet ispol'zovat', veroyatno, boleye medlennyy konsol'nyy API.
Opening URL... Make sure to follow the s: Otkrytiye URL ... Obyazatel'no sleduyte instruktsiyam na ekrane.
Can not run in maintenance mode?: Ne mozhet rabotat' v rezhime obsluzhivaniya?
